nodes.text: The Elite Senate Guard were a chosen few selected from the best of the Senate Guard whose responsibilities included protection of the Supreme Chancellor as well as other important senators. They often accompanied the senators to their home planet and back to Coruscant, ensuring their safe passage. They also conducted investigations, working alongside the Jedi Order. They wore robes consisting of the same distinctive blue worn by the Senate Guard and the Senate Commandos, and wielded a heavy blaster rifle outfitted with a stun bayonet.
